Text: Not a problem. I had been searching for a few years to get this game and got my hands on the actual disks so I thought I would do everyone a favor and share them since no one has given the community a full english rip.

Hey, it's very good that you upload the game in english since many have been looking for it. (I have it on disc though..)

Anyway, have you included the patches for the game that gives you the ability to play online?
